Text: Cool. I've never checked out the Dark Horse releases. Read the previously translated versions several times, though. Definitely some great reads.

Hehe, enjoy them, Spock...and remember to go buy them, they are a steal, and should REALLY be on every comic readers shelf. 
They are priced at under 20$ for the first, that got book 1-3 and same for the second which just got book 4, but DOUBLE he pagecount, due to extras and a few short stories.
